thread.title: The Demi Lovato dance challenge is taking over the internet and well, 2017 is looking good
thread.title_full: The Demi Lovato dance challenge is taking over the internet and well, 2017 is looking good

author: Angelica Florio
title: The Demi Lovato dance challenge is taking over the internet and well, 2017 is looking good
text:
The Demi Lovato dance challenge is taking over the internet and well, 2017 is looking good Everyone loves a good viral internet dance challenge. Hey, the Mannequin Challenge made it to outer space, and the Soulja Boy Challenge made it to Chrissy Teigan and John Legend’s bathroom! Now we are graced with the Demi Lovato dance challenge , but it’s not what you think.
Demi might not actually even be aware of the viral web trend , and she’s not even the singer of the song that the dance is set to. Oh, kids these days., That would be the mega-talented 16 year-old rapper named Kandi Reign whose song about Demi Lovato has lit the fire to this trend and it’s, well, .
Here’s Kandi’s video that started the whole phenomenon:
Rocking her signature afro puffs and face mask, Kandi and her friends break it down to her song whose lyrics are simply (but oh-so powerfully), “I feel like Demi Lovato.” Reign goes on to rap more about her goals-worthy confidence and self-love, and obviously people can’t get enough of it since now it seems everyone feels like Demi Lovato.
LIT! @iameily and her sis @iamalexus killing my #DemiLovatoChallenge WHO NEXT? (link in bio) 
A video posted by Kandi Reign • The Brand ☔️ (@iamkandireign) on Dec 22, 2016 at 12:25pm PST 
Kandi Reign has been posting videos on her Instagram, and clearly she’s loving it:
My challenge #DemiLovatoChallenge is going viral on twitter! I feel like Demi Lovato 
— Therealkandireign (@Iamkandireign_) December 29, 2016 And so is everyone else:
*sees #DemiLovatoChallenge trending* pic.twitter.com/79R1MGEJqq 
— Tabitha ☁️❤️ (@tabitha_janese) December 29, 2016 This #DemiLovatoChallenge should go viral everywhere and @ddlovato should see it!! pic.twitter.com/gcRCqvB5Cs 
— GRAMMYNOMINEEDEMI (@Demisgorgeous) December 29, 2016 Everybody wants feel like Demi Lovato #DemiLovatoChallenge 
— fire starter (@demilovtimes) December 29, 2016 Not only is Kandi Reign insanely talented, but her fans also happen to be dance masters. The power of Demi is clearly with them.
Musical.ly famous @laurieelle KILLING my #DemiLovatoChallenge ✨ (UK rockin with it) 
A video posted by Kandi Reign • The Brand ☔️ (@iamkandireign) on Dec 30, 2016 at 4:46pm PST 
This could be the new Juju on That Beat and we so hope it is because everybody deserves to feel like Demi Lovato in 2017.

Thank you, Kandi Reign.
The post The Demi Lovato dance challenge is taking over the internet and well, 2017 is looking good appeared first on HelloGiggles .
